about_the_game:
Dive into a vibrant world filled with challenging levels, formidable bosses, and countless UwUs to collect. Your mission is simple: jump, shoot, fight and navigate through treacherous terrains to gather all the UwUs ♥ and win the love of your adorable Catgirl.

• Dynamic Gameplay
Experience fast-paced action as you jump and shoot your way through meticulously designed levels. Each level presents unique obstacles and enemies that will test your skills and reflexes.

• Epic Boss Battles
Face off against powerful bosses that will push you to your limits. Learn their patterns, dodge their attacks, and defeat them to progress further in your quest.

• Collect UwUs
Unlock and collect UwUs scattered throughout the game. Each UwU you gather brings you one step closer to earning the love of your Catgirl.

• Earn Your Stars!
Race against the clock in every level! Complete levels fast enough to earn a Bronze, Silver, or Gold star, with your best time proudly displayed on the Steam Leaderboard. Can you beat your own record and collect all the Gold stars?

• Explore the Gallery
Revisit and admire all the UwUs you’ve collected in the Gallery. Relive your achievements and enjoy the cute, captivating artwork that makes each UwU special.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Some Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content

name: UwU Hunter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or greater
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Jump and shoot your way through challenging levels, battle formidable bosses, and unlock all the UwUs ♥ to win the heart of your Catgirl. Explore the Gallery to enjoy all the UwUs you've collected.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean
